installCommand: yarn global add vercel@latest && yarn && yarn testCi && yarn prisma generate
buildCommand: cd ../.. && npx turbo run build --filter=web... && env && if [ "$DEPLOY_STAGING" = true ]; then vercel alias --token=$VERCEL_CLI_TOKEN set $VERCEL_BRANCH_URL staging.jprojects.dev --scope=$VERCEL_SCOPE; fi
